content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":168211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺とレイラさんの過去を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will reveal the past between me and Layla-san"},{"lineNumber":168212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その場にいる全員に暴露してやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"to everyone present here.\""},{"lineNumber":168213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　皆、びっくりするぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! Everyone will be shocked!\""},{"lineNumber":168214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、め、て！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-stop it!\""},{"lineNumber":168215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うむ……分かった、やんない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um... alright, I won’t do it...\""},{"lineNumber":168216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……認めてくださって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you for acknowledging that,"},{"lineNumber":168217,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にありがとうございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"I really appreciate it.\""},{"lineNumber":168218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ、けっ、けっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, heh, heh.\""},{"lineNumber":168219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リック……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rick...\""},{"lineNumber":168220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":168221,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックとレイラは手を取り合い、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick and Layla took each other's hands,"},{"lineNumber":168222,"originalJapaneseLine":"朗らかに笑い合っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and were laughing brightly together."},{"lineNumber":168223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":168224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいとこあるじゃーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You do have some good qualities, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":168225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙ってろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shut up.\""},{"lineNumber":168226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だりゃーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Darya-------!\""},{"lineNumber":168227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うあっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uah!?\""},{"lineNumber":168228,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスアタックが炸裂し、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Lance Attack exploded,"},{"lineNumber":168229,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックが床に叩きつけられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rick was slammed into the floor."},{"lineNumber":168230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこまで！　勝負ありー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's it! The match is over!\""},{"lineNumber":168231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":168232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":168233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やーん、ダーリンかっこいいー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yaaan, darling is so cool!\""},{"lineNumber":168234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すごーい、リックちゃんに勝っちゃったー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Awesome, you beat Rick-chan."},{"lineNumber":168235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスちゃん、おめでとー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Congrats, Lance-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":168236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":168237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ、当然だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm, it's only natural.\""},{"lineNumber":168238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":168239,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばし唖然としていたリックは","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick, momentarily stunned,"},{"lineNumber":168240,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゆらりと立ち上がると、","translatedEnglishLine":"slowly stood up,"},{"lineNumber":168241,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに向けて一礼をした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and bowed to Lance."},{"lineNumber":168242,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ありがとうござい……ました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you very... much...\""},{"lineNumber":168243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レイラさん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Layla-san...\""},{"lineNumber":168244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、はい！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, yes!?\""},{"lineNumber":168245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……すみません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm sorry."},{"lineNumber":168246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　婚約は破棄でお願いいたします」","translatedEnglishLine":"I ask that our engagement be broken off.\""},{"lineNumber":168247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ、リック！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah, Rick!\""},{"lineNumber":168248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで、終わりにはしません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is not the end..."},{"lineNumber":168249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　修行の……やり直しです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The training... will start over...\""},{"lineNumber":168250,"originalJapaneseLine":"トボトボとリックは退室していった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick trudged out of the room."},{"lineNumber":168251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行っちゃったー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He’s gone—\""},{"lineNumber":168252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、心の友、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, my soul friend,"},{"lineNumber":168253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝っちまってどうすんのよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"what are you going to do now that you've won?\""},{"lineNumber":168254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":168255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつ相手に手を抜いて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's no way I would go easy on him"},{"lineNumber":168256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上手く負けるなんて出来るか」","translatedEnglishLine":"or purposely lose against that guy.\""},{"lineNumber":168257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんてことしてくれるのよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the heck do you think you're doing!\""},{"lineNumber":168258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa!\""},{"lineNumber":168259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わた、私があの奥手君をここまで","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's me who put so much effort into bringing that shy guy this far,"},{"lineNumber":168260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　持ってくるのにどれだけ苦労したと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you have no idea how much trouble I went through...\""},{"lineNumber":168261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「四年よ！　四年！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Four years! Four years!\""},{"lineNumber":168262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁぁぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaa...\""},{"lineNumber":168263,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、また振り出しだなんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Starting all over again...\""},{"lineNumber":168264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ、なんか悪いことした気がしてきた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I’m starting to feel like I did something wrong.\""},{"lineNumber":168265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「したの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You did!\""},{"lineNumber":168266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス君！　今夜は付き合いなさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance-kun! You’re coming with me tonight!"},{"lineNumber":168267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寝かせないから！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t let you sleep!\""},{"lineNumber":168268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっ、まさか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, no way...\""},{"lineNumber":168269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス君が期待するようなことじゃなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s not what you’re expecting, Lance-kun,"},{"lineNumber":168270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お酒に付き合いなさいと言ってるの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I mean come drink with me!\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will reveal the past between me and Layla-san

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいる全員に暴露してやろう」
「がははは！　皆、びっくりするぞ！」
本当にありがとうございます」
リックとレイラは手を取り合い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick and Layla took each other's hands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朗らかに笑い合っていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You do have some good qualities, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスアタックが炸裂し、
リックが床に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rick was slammed into the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やーん、ダーリンかっこいいー！」
「すごーい、リックちゃんに勝っちゃったー。
ランスちゃん、おめでとー」
しばし唖然としていたリックは
ゆらりと立ち上がると、
ランスに向けて一礼をした。
婚約は破棄でお願いいたします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I ask that our engagement be broken off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで、終わりにはしません……
トボトボとリックは退室していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick trudged out of the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝っちまってどうすんのよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what are you going to do now that you've won?"
"There's no way I would go easy on him

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上手く負けるなんて出来るか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or purposely lose against that guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてことしてくれるのよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the heck do you think you're doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わた、私があの奥手君をここまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's me who put so much effort into bringing that shy guy this far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ってくるのにどれだけ苦労したと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have no idea how much trouble I went through..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、また振り出しだなんて……」
「うーむ、なんか悪いことした気がしてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I’m starting to feel like I did something wrong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス君！　今夜は付き合いなさい！
「ランス君が期待するようなことじゃなくて、
お酒に付き合いなさいと言ってるの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mean come drink with me!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいる全員に暴露してやろう」
「がははは！　皆、びっくりするぞ！」
本当にありがとうございます」
リックとレイラは手を取り合い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick and Layla took each other's hands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朗らかに笑い合っていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You do have some good qualities, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスアタックが炸裂し、
リックが床に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rick was slammed into the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やーん、ダーリンかっこいいー！」
「すごーい、リックちゃんに勝っちゃったー。
ランスちゃん、おめでとー」
しばし唖然としていたリックは
ゆらりと立ち上がると、
ランスに向けて一礼をした。
婚約は破棄でお願いいたします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I ask that our engagement be broken off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで、終わりにはしません……
トボトボとリックは退室していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick trudged out of the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝っちまってどうすんのよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what are you going to do now that you've won?"
"There's no way I would go easy on him

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上手く負けるなんて出来るか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or purposely lose against that guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてことしてくれるのよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the heck do you think you're doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わた、私があの奥手君をここまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's me who put so much effort into bringing that shy guy this far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ってくるのにどれだけ苦労したと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have no idea how much trouble I went through..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、また振り出しだなんて……」
「うーむ、なんか悪いことした気がしてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I’m starting to feel like I did something wrong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス君！　今夜は付き合いなさい！
「ランス君が期待するようなことじゃなくて、
お酒に付き合いなさいと言ってるの！」
